refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o STKBeeThree.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kv1 = p6 ;feedback of operator 4 kv2 line p4, p3, p5 ;gain of operator 3 kv5 line 0, p3, 100 ipch = p7
asig STKBeeThree cpspch(ipch), 1, 2, kv1, 4, kv2, 11, 50, 1, 0, 128, kv5 outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2 20 100 127 8.00 i 1 + 8 120 0 0 6.09 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
